changeSet.author: Adarsh
changeSet.sql: Set search_path = plf,public,pg_catalog;

changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE='Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE='ALLOW_LOWER_TAX_DED_REQ';

Manoj
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE='Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE='HOLD_DISB_INST_POST';

changeSet.author: Saikiran.V

dheerendra.d
changeSet.sql: update data_engine_config set uploadpath ='/opt/clix_8090/PFF/BASE/OGL' where name ='OGL_DOWNLOAD';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE='Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE='VAN_REQUIRED';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.data_engine_config set fileprefixname = 'CLIXCAP_CL77RBI' where name = 'DISB_EXPORT_DEFAULT';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.data_engine_column set derivedfrom = null where name = 'DISBURSEMENT_DATE' and tableid in(select id from plf.data_engine_table where configid in (select id from plf.data_engine_config where name = 'DISB_EXPORT_DEFAULT' ))

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE='Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE='FI_DOCUMENT_MANDATORY'; UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE='Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE='VERIFICATION_RCU_EYEBALLED_VALUE';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.createView: SELECT DS.ID, DC.NAME, DC.UPLOADPATH FILELOCATION, DS.FILENAME, DS.ENDTIME, DS.STATUS, DC.id AS CONFIGID, DC.POSTEVENT, DS.VALUEDATE, DS.USERID, TH.STARTDATE, TH.ENDDATE FROM plf.DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG DC INNER JOIN plf.DATA_ENGINE_STATUS DS ON DS.NAME = DC.NAME LEFT join plf.TRIAL_BALANCE_HEADER TH on TH.FILENAME=DS.FILENAME ORDER BY DS.ID DESC

changeSet.author: amanullah
changeSet.createView: SELECT a.postdate AS acctDate, a.acccy AS ccyCode, md.key_code as jecode, 'PENNANT' AS jeSrcName, m.Key_code as sgmt1Ble, COALESCE(ma.Key_code,'160') as prodCatCode, '00' as programcode, rb.branchswiftbrncde as branchcode, ac.hostaccount, pb.AccountNo as acctNo, '000000' AS sgmt5, a.finevent AS event, a.finreference AS lan, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN a.postamount WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN 0 ELSE NULL END AS debit, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN 0 WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN a.postamount ELSE NULL END AS credit, a.valuedate AS transactiondate, b.fintype AS loantype, f.custshrtname AS customername, f.custid AS customerid, c.findivision AS divisioncode, fd.favournumber as chequenumber, a.entitycode, a.linkedtranid FROM postings a LEFT JOIN financemain b ON a.finreference = b.finreference LEFT JOIN rmtfinancetypes c ON c.fintype = b.fintype LEFT JOIN partnerbanks pb ON pb.actype = a.accounttype LEFT JOIN customers f ON f.custid = b.custid LEFT JOIN master_def md ON md.key_type = a.finevent LEFT JOIN master_def m ON m.key_type = a.entitycode LEFT JOIN master_def ma ON ma.key_type = c.fincategory LEFT JOIN accountmapping ac ON ac.account = a.account LEFT JOIN rmtbranches rb ON rb.branchcode = a.userbranch LEFT JOIN finreceiptheader fh ON fh.reference = a.finreference LEFT JOIN finreceiptdetail fd ON fd.receiptid = fh.receiptid;

changeSet.author: amanullah
amanullah
changeSet.createView: SELECT a.postdate AS acctDate, a.acccy AS ccyCode, md.key_code as jecode, 'PENNANT' AS jeSrcName, m.Key_code as sgmt1Ble, COALESCE(ma.Key_code,'160') as prodCatCode, b.eligibilityMethod as programcode, rb.branchswiftbrncde as branchcode, ac.hostaccount, pb.AccountNo as acctNo, '000000' AS sgmt5, a.finevent AS event, a.finreference AS lan, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN a.postamount WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN 0 ELSE NULL END AS debit, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN 0 WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN a.postamount ELSE NULL END AS credit, a.valuedate AS transactiondate, b.fintype AS loantype, f.custshrtname AS customername, f.custid AS customerid, c.findivision AS divisioncode, fd.favournumber as chequenumber, a.entitycode, a.linkedtranid, fd.paymenttype FROM postings a LEFT JOIN financemain b ON a.finreference = b.finreference LEFT JOIN rmtfinancetypes c ON c.fintype = b.fintype LEFT JOIN partnerbanks pb ON pb.actype = a.accounttype LEFT JOIN customers f ON f.custid = b.custid LEFT JOIN master_def md ON md.key_type = a.finevent LEFT JOIN master_def m ON m.key_type = a.entitycode LEFT JOIN master_def ma ON ma.key_type = c.fincategory LEFT JOIN accountmapping ac ON ac.account = a.account LEFT JOIN rmtbranches rb ON rb.branchcode = a.userbranch LEFT JOIN finreceiptheader fh ON fh.reference = a.finreference LEFT JOIN finreceiptdetail fd ON fd.receiptid = fh.receiptid;

changeSet.author: amanullah
amanullah
changeSet.sql: update data_engine_config set postevent = 'MOVE_TO_S3_BUCKET,COPY_TO_SFTP', uploadpath='/opt/PFF/OGL' where name = 'OGL_DOWNLOAD';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.reportconfiguration set schedulereq = 1 where menuitemcode='menu_Item_WelcomeLetter';

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: Insert into plf.REPORTFILTERFIELDS values ((select reportid from plf.reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_WelcomeLetter'),1,'Loan Reference','LOVSEARCH','Loan Reference','T.finreference',null,'FinanceMain','getFinReference','getFinReference',0,0,0,0,1,1,' ',' ',' ',' ',250,0,'=',1,1000,'Approved',null,null,null,null,null,0,current_timestamp,null);

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.reportfilterfields set fielddbname='fm.finreference' where reportid in (select reportid from plf.reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_NoObjectionCertificate');

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.data_engine_config set fileprefixname = 'CLIXCAP_CL77RBI_CLRBI' where name = 'DISB_EXPORT_DEFAULT';

changeSet.author: amanullah
changeSet.sql:
update data_engine_column set format= 'DATE:ddMMyyyy' where name='accountingdate';
update data_engine_column set format= 'DATE:ddMMyyyy' where name='attribute7_valuedate';

changeSet.author: amanullah
changeSet.sql: update plf.data_engine_column set name= 'REF10_JOURLINEDESCORNARRATION' where name='reference10_journallinedescornarration';

changeSet.author: amanullah
changeSet.createView: SELECT a.postdate AS acctDate, a.acccy AS ccyCode, CASE WHEN a.Finevent = 'DISBINS' OR a.AccountType ='BANK' Then 'C-PABPV' when a.finevent = 'RECIP' THEN 'C-PABRV' when a.finevent IN ('B2C','C2B') THEN 'C-PACRV' ELSE 'C-PAJRL' END AS jecode, 'PENNANT' AS jeSrcName, m.Key_code as sgmt1Ble, ma.Key_code as prodCatCode, b.eligibilitymethod as programcode, rb.branchswiftbrncde as branchcode, ac.hostaccount, COALESCE(pb.AccountNo,'0') acctNo, '000000' sgmt5, CASE WHEN a.Finevent = 'DISBINS' Then 'Disbursement' when a.finevent = 'RECIP' THEN 'Receipt' ELSE 'Other' END AS event, a.finreference AS lan, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN a.postamount WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END AS debit, CASE WHEN a.drorcr = 'D' THEN 0 WHEN a.drorcr = 'C' THEN a.postamount ELSE 0 END AS credit, a.valuedate transactiondate, b.fintype AS loantype, f.custshrtname AS customername, f.custid AS customerid, c.findivision AS divisioncode, fd.favournumber as chequenumber, COALESCE(fd.transactionref,'0') transactionId, a.entitycode, fd.paymenttype, COALESCE(pb.partnerbankname,'') patnerbankname FROM plf.postings a LEFT JOIN plf.financemain b ON a.finreference = b.finreference LEFT JOIN plf.rmtfinancetypes c ON c.fintype = b.fintype LEFT JOIN plf.partnerbanks pb ON pb.actype = a.accounttype LEFT JOIN plf.customers f ON f.custid = b.custid LEFT JOIN plf.master_def md ON md.key_type = a.finevent LEFT JOIN plf.master_def m ON m.key_type = a.entitycode LEFT JOIN plf.master_def ma ON ma.key_type = c.fincategory LEFT JOIN plf.accountmapping ac ON ac.account = a.account LEFT JOIN plf.rmtbranches rb ON rb.branchcode = a.userbranch LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptheader fh ON fh.reference = a.finreference LEFT JOIN plf.finreceiptdetail fd ON fd.receiptid = fh.receiptid where a.postamount > 0;

changeSet.author: amanullah
amanullah
Manoj
Manoj
Manoj.P
changeSet.createView: SELECT M.MANDATEID, BD.BANKSHORTCODE BANKCODE, BD.BANKNAME, case when LB.BRANCHCODE IS NULL THEN CB.BRANCHCODE ELSE LB.BRANCHCODE END BRANCHCODE, case when LB.BRANCHDESC IS NULL THEN CB.BRANCHDESC ELSE LB.BRANCHDESC END BRANCHDESC, CUST.CUSTCIF, CUST.CUSTSHRTNAME, CUST.CustCoreBank, FT.FINTYPEDESC FINTYPE , FIN.FINREFERENCE , COALESCE((SELECT SUM(TotalAmount) from (Select MAX(FSD.REPAYAMOUNT+FSD.FEESCHD) TotalAmount FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS FSD INNER JOIN plf.FINANCEMAIN FM ON FM.FINREFERENCE =FSD.FINREFERENCE AND FM.CUSTID = M.CUSTID GROUP BY FM.FINREFERENCE)T)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 0) CUST_EMI, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(TotalAmount) from (Select MAX(FSD.REPAYAMOUNT+FSD.FEESCHD) TotalAmount FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS FSD WHERE (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) AND FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID = M.MANDATEID) GROUP BY FINREFERENCE)T)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 0) EMI, CASE M.OPENMANDATE WHEN 1 THEN 'New Open ECS' ELSE 'No Open ECS' END OPENMANDATE, M.ACCNUMBER, CASE WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '10' then 'Savings' WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '11' then 'CA' WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '11' then 'CC' ELSE M.ACCTYPE END ACCTYPE, M.ACCHOLDERNAME, BB.MICR, BB.IFSC, BB.ADDOFBRANCH, (select MIN(FIRSTREPAYDATE) from plf.FINPFTDETAILS where FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID)) FIRSTDUEDATE, (select MAX(SCHDATE) from plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS where (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) and FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID)) EMIENDDATE, COALESCE (M.MAXLIMIT, 0) MAXLIMIT, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(MANDATEDEBITAMOUNT) from (Select MAX(REPAYAMOUNT+FEESCHD) MANDATEDEBITAMOUNT FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS WHERE (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) AND FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID) GROUP BY FINREFERENCE)T), 0)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS DEBITAMOUNT, FIN.NumberOfTerms, M.periodicity, M.STARTDATE, M.EXPIRYDATE, FIN.APPLICATIONNO, M.MANDATETYPE, M.STATUS, M.INPUTDATE, M.RECORDSTATUS, M.RECORDTYPE, M.MANDATECCY, COALESCE (CCY.CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 100) CCYMINORCCYUNITS, M.EntityCode, CP.PHONENUMBER, CE.CUSTEMAIL, PB.PARTNERBANKNAME, M.LASTMNTON FROM plf.MANDATES M INNER JOIN plf.BANKBRANCHES BB ON BB.BANKBRANCHID = M.BANKBRANCHID INNER JOIN plf.BMTBANKDETAIL BD ON BD.BANKCODE=BB.BANKCODE INNER JOIN plf.CUSTOMERS CUST ON CUST.CUSTID = M.CUSTID INNER JOIN plf.RMTBRANCHES CB ON CB.BRANCHCODE = CUST.CUSTDFTBRANCH LEFT JOIN plf.PARTNERBANKS PB ON PB.PARTNERBANKID = M.PARTNERBANKID LEFT JOIN plf.CUSTOMEREMAILS CE ON CE.CUSTID = CUST.CUSTID AND CE.CUSTEMAILPRIORITY = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.CUSTOMERPHONENUMBERS CP ON CP.PHONECUSTID = CUST.CUSTID AND CP.PHONETYPEPRIORITY = 5 LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.RMTCURRENCIES CCY ON CCY.CCYCODE = M.MANDATECCY LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.FINANCEMAIN FIN ON M.ORGREFERENCE=FIN.FINREFERENCE LEFT JOIN plf.RMTBRANCHES LB ON LB.BRANCHCODE = FIN.FINBRANCH LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.RMTFINANCETYPES FT ON FIN.FINTYPE =FT.FINTYPE WHERE M.STATUS = 'NEW' AND M.MANDATEID NOT IN (select MANDATEID FROM plf.MANDATE_REQUESTS where (status = 'AC' OR status = 'NEW'))

changeSet.author: Manoj
Manoj
changeSet.createView: SELECT M.MANDATEID, BD.BANKSHORTCODE BANKCODE, BD.BANKNAME, case when LB.BRANCHCODE IS NULL THEN CB.BRANCHCODE ELSE LB.BRANCHCODE END BRANCHCODE, case when LB.BRANCHDESC IS NULL THEN CB.BRANCHDESC ELSE LB.BRANCHDESC END BRANCHDESC, CUST.CUSTCIF, CUST.CUSTSHRTNAME, CUST.CustCoreBank, FT.FINTYPEDESC FINTYPE , FIN.FINREFERENCE , COALESCE((SELECT SUM(TotalAmount) from (Select MAX(FSD.REPAYAMOUNT+FSD.FEESCHD) TotalAmount FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS FSD INNER JOIN plf.FINANCEMAIN FM ON FM.FINREFERENCE =FSD.FINREFERENCE AND FM.CUSTID = M.CUSTID GROUP BY FM.FINREFERENCE)T)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 0) CUST_EMI, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(TotalAmount) from (Select MAX(FSD.REPAYAMOUNT+FSD.FEESCHD) TotalAmount FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS FSD WHERE (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) AND FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID = M.MANDATEID) GROUP BY FINREFERENCE)T)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 0) EMI, CASE M.OPENMANDATE WHEN 1 THEN 'New Open ECS' ELSE 'No Open ECS' END OPENMANDATE, M.ACCNUMBER, CASE WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '10' then 'Savings' WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '11' then 'CA' WHEN M.ACCTYPE = '12' then 'CC' ELSE M.ACCTYPE END ACCTYPE, M.ACCHOLDERNAME, BB.MICR, BB.IFSC, BB.ADDOFBRANCH, (select MIN(FIRSTREPAYDATE) from plf.FINPFTDETAILS where FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID)) FIRSTDUEDATE, (select MAX(SCHDATE) from plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS where (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) and FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID)) EMIENDDATE, COALESCE (M.MAXLIMIT, 0) MAXLIMIT, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(MANDATEDEBITAMOUNT) from (Select MAX(REPAYAMOUNT+FEESCHD) MANDATEDEBITAMOUNT FROM plf.FINSCHEDULEDETAILS WHERE (REPAYONSCHDATE = 1 OR PFTONSCHDATE = 1) AND FINREFERENCE IN (SELECT FINREFERENCE FROM plf.FINANCEMAIN WHERE MANDATEID=M.MANDATEID) GROUP BY FINREFERENCE)T), 0)/CCYMINORCCYUNITS DEBITAMOUNT, FIN.NumberOfTerms, M.periodicity, M.STARTDATE, M.EXPIRYDATE, FIN.APPLICATIONNO, M.MANDATETYPE, M.STATUS, M.INPUTDATE, M.RECORDSTATUS, M.RECORDTYPE, M.MANDATECCY, COALESCE (CCY.CCYMINORCCYUNITS, 100) CCYMINORCCYUNITS, M.EntityCode, CP.PHONENUMBER, CE.CUSTEMAIL, PB.PARTNERBANKNAME, M.LASTMNTON FROM plf.MANDATES M INNER JOIN plf.BANKBRANCHES BB ON BB.BANKBRANCHID = M.BANKBRANCHID INNER JOIN plf.BMTBANKDETAIL BD ON BD.BANKCODE=BB.BANKCODE INNER JOIN plf.CUSTOMERS CUST ON CUST.CUSTID = M.CUSTID INNER JOIN plf.RMTBRANCHES CB ON CB.BRANCHCODE = CUST.CUSTDFTBRANCH LEFT JOIN plf.PARTNERBANKS PB ON PB.PARTNERBANKID = M.PARTNERBANKID LEFT JOIN plf.CUSTOMEREMAILS CE ON CE.CUSTID = CUST.CUSTID AND CE.CUSTEMAILPRIORITY = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.CUSTOMERPHONENUMBERS CP ON CP.PHONECUSTID = CUST.CUSTID AND CP.PHONETYPEPRIORITY = 5 LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.RMTCURRENCIES CCY ON CCY.CCYCODE = M.MANDATECCY LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.FINANCEMAIN FIN ON M.ORGREFERENCE=FIN.FINREFERENCE LEFT JOIN plf.RMTBRANCHES LB ON LB.BRANCHCODE = FIN.FINBRANCH LEFT OUTER JOIN plf.RMTFINANCETYPES FT ON FIN.FINTYPE =FT.FINTYPE WHERE M.STATUS = 'NEW' AND M.MANDATEID NOT IN (select MANDATEID FROM plf.MANDATE_REQUESTS where (status = 'AC' OR status = 'NEW'))

changeSet.author: Manoj
Manoj.p
changeSet.createView: SELECT fa.paymentid, fa.finreference, 'D' AS channel, 0 AS providerid, CASE WHEN fa.paymenttype = 'NEFT'THEN 'N' WHEN fa.paymenttype = 'RTGS'THEN 'R' WHEN fa.paymenttype = 'DD'THEN 'D' WHEN fa.paymenttype = 'CHEQUE'THEN 'C' ELSE fa.paymenttype END AS disbursement_type, fa.amttobereleased, fa.disbdate, fa.lldate, fa.payableloc, fa.printingloc, cu.custcif, cu.custshrtname, '' AS customer_mobile, ce.custemail AS customer_email, cs.cpprovincename AS customer_state, cc.pccityname AS customer_city, '' AS customer_address1, '' AS customer_address2, '' AS customer_address3, '' AS customer_address4, '' AS customer_address5, bd.bankname, bb.branchcode, bb.branchdesc, pbd.cpprovincename AS benficiary_branch_state, pbd.pccityname AS benficiary_branch_city, bb.micr AS micr_code, bb.ifsc AS ifsc_code, fa.beneficiaryaccno, CASE WHEN fa.paymenttype = 'CHEQUE'OR fa.paymenttype = 'DD'THEN fa.liabilityholdname ELSE fa.beneficiaryname END AS beneficiaryname, (fa.phonecountrycode || fa.phoneareacode) || fa.phonenumber AS beneficiary_mobile, bce.custemail AS benficiry_email, brs.cpprovincename AS benficiary_state, brc.pccityname AS benficiary_city, '' AS benficiary_address1, '' AS benficiary_address2, '' AS benficiary_address3, '' AS benficiary_address4, '' AS benficiary_address5, '' AS payment_detail1, '' AS payment_detail2, '' AS payment_detail3, '' AS payment_detail4, '' AS payment_detail5, '' AS payment_detail6, '' AS payment_detail7, fa.status, fa.description AS remarks, fa.paymenttype, fm.fintype, pb.partnerbankid, pb.partnerbankcode, fa.inputdate, pb.alwfiledownload, pb.filename, fm.finisactive, smd.entitycode FROM plf.finadvancepayments fa JOIN ( SELECT financemain_temp.custid, financemain_temp.finreference, financemain_temp.fintype, financemain_temp.finisactive FROM plf.financemain_temp UNION ALL SELECT t2.custid, t2.finreference, t2.fintype, t2.finisactive FROM plf.financemain t2 WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM plf.financemain_temp t3 WHERE t3.finreference = t2.finreference))) fm ON fm.finreference = fa.finreference JOIN plf.customers cu ON cu.custid = fm.custid JOIN plf.rmtcurrencies ccy ON ccy.ccycode = fa.disbccy JOIN plf.partnerbanks pb ON pb.partnerbankid = fa.partnerbankid LEFT JOIN plf.customeremails ce ON ce.custid = cu.custid AND ce.custemailpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.customeraddresses ca ON ca.custid = ce.custid AND ca.custaddrpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity cc ON cc.pccity = ca.custaddrcity LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince cs ON cs.cpprovince = cc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.bankbranches bb ON bb.bankbranchid = fa.bankbranchid LEFT JOIN plf.bmtbankdetail bd ON bd.bankcode = bb.bankcode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pb_1.partnerbankid, pbd_1.bankname, pbb.branchdesc, pbbrc.pccityname, pbbrs.cpprovincename FROM plf.partnerbanks pb_1 JOIN plf.bankbranches pbb ON pbb.branchcode = pb_1.bankbranchcode JOIN plf.bmtbankdetail pbd_1 ON pbd_1.bankcode = pbb.bankcode LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity pbbrc ON pbbrc.pccity = pbb.city LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince pbbrs ON pbbrs.cpprovince = pbbrc.pcprovince) pbd ON pbd.partnerbankid = pb.partnerbankid LEFT JOIN plf.beneficiary br ON br.bankbranchid = fa.bankbranchid AND br.accnumber = fa.beneficiaryaccno AND br.custid = fm.custid LEFT JOIN plf.customers bc ON bc.custid = br.custid LEFT JOIN plf.customeremails bce ON bce.custid = cu.custid AND bce.custemailpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.customeraddresses brca ON brca.custid = br.custid AND brca.custaddrpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity brc ON brc.pccity = brca.custaddrcity LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince brs ON brs.cpprovince = brc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.rmtfinancetypes rft ON fm.fintype = rft.fintype LEFT JOIN plf.smtdivisiondetail smd ON rft.findivision = smd.divisioncode WHERE fa.status = 'APPROVED'AND NOT (fa.paymentid IN ( SELECT disbursement_requests.disbursement_id FROM plf.disbursement_requests where channel='D')) AND NOT (fa.paymentid IN ( SELECT finadvancepayments_temp.paymentid FROM plf.finadvancepayments_temp)) UNION ALL SELECT pi.paymentinstructionid AS paymentid, ph.finreference, ph.paymenttype AS channel, 0 AS providerid, CASE WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'NEFT'THEN 'N' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'RTGS'THEN 'R' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'DD'THEN 'D' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'CHEQUE'THEN 'C' ELSE pi.paymenttype END AS disbursement_type, pi.paymentamount / ccy.ccyminorccyunits AS amttobereleased, pi.postdate AS disbdate, pi.postdate AS lldate, pi.payableloc, pi.printingloc, cu.custcif, cu.custshrtname, '' AS customer_mobile, ce.custemail AS customer_email, cs.cpprovincename AS customer_state, cc.pccityname AS customer_city, '' AS customer_address1, '' AS customer_address2, '' AS customer_address3, '' AS customer_address4, '' AS customer_address5, bd.bankname, bb.branchcode, bb.branchdesc, bbrs.cpprovincename AS benficiary_branch_state, bbrc.pccityname AS benficiary_branch_city, bb.micr AS micr_code, bb.ifsc AS ifsc_code, pi.accountno AS beneficiaryaccno, CASE WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'CHEQUE'OR pi.paymenttype = 'DD'THEN pi.favourname ELSE pi.acctholdername END AS beneficiaryname, pi.phonecountrycode || pi.phonenumber AS beneficiary_mobile, bce.custemail AS benficiry_email, brs.cpprovincename AS benficiary_state, brc.pccityname AS benficiary_city, '' AS benficiary_address1, '' AS benficiary_address2, '' AS benficiary_address3, '' AS benficiary_address4, '' AS benficiary_address5, '' AS payment_detail1, '' AS payment_detail2, '' AS payment_detail3, '' AS payment_detail4, '' AS payment_detail5, '' AS payment_detail6, '' AS payment_detail7, pi.status, pi.remarks, pi.paymenttype, fm.fintype, pb.partnerbankid, pb.partnerbankcode, pi.postdate AS inputdate, pb.alwfiledownload, pb.filename, fm.finisactive, smd.entitycode FROM plf.paymentinstructions pi JOIN plf.paymentheader ph ON ph.paymentid = pi.paymentid JOIN ( SELECT financemain.custid, financemain.finreference, financemain.fintype, financemain.finisactive FROM plf.financemain UNION ALL SELECT t2.custid, t2.finreference, t2.fintype, t2.finisactive FROM plf.financemain_temp t2 WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM plf.financemain_temp t3 WHERE t3.finreference = t2.finreference))) fm ON fm.finreference = ph.finreference JOIN plf.customers cu ON cu.custid = fm.custid JOIN plf.rmtcurrencies ccy ON ccy.ccycode = pi.paymentccy JOIN plf.partnerbanks pb ON pb.partnerbankid = pi.partnerbankid LEFT JOIN plf.customeremails ce ON ce.custid = cu.custid AND ce.custemailpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.customeraddresses ca ON ca.custid = ce.custid AND ca.custaddrpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity cc ON cc.pccity = ca.custaddrcity LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince cs ON cs.cpprovince = cc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.customerphonenumbers cm ON cm.phonecustid = cu.custid AND cm.phonetypecode = 'MOBILE1'AND cm.phonetypepriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.bankbranches bb ON bb.bankbranchid = pi.bankbranchid LEFT JOIN plf.bmtbankdetail bd ON bd.bankcode = bb.bankcode LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity bbrc ON bbrc.pccity = bb.city LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince bbrs ON bbrs.cpprovince = bbrc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.beneficiary br ON br.bankbranchid = pi.bankbranchid AND br.accnumber = pi.accountno AND br.custid = fm.custid LEFT JOIN plf.customers bc ON bc.custid = br.custid LEFT JOIN plf.customeremails bce ON bce.custid = cu.custid AND bce.custemailpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.customeraddresses brca ON brca.custid = br.custid AND brca.custaddrpriority = 5 LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity brc ON brc.pccity = brca.custaddrcity LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince brs ON brs.cpprovince = brc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.rmtfinancetypes rft ON fm.fintype = rft.fintype LEFT JOIN plf.smtdivisiondetail smd ON rft.findivision = smd.divisioncode WHERE pi.status = 'APPROVED'AND NOT (pi.paymentinstructionid IN ( SELECT disbursement_requests.disbursement_id FROM plf.disbursement_requests where channel='P')) UNION ALL SELECT pi.id AS paymentid, vr.PrimaryLinkRef AS finreference, 'I' AS channel, pi.providerid, CASE WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'NEFT' THEN 'N' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'RTGS' THEN 'R' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'DD' THEN 'D' WHEN pi.paymenttype = 'CHEQUE' THEN 'C' ELSE pi.paymenttype END AS disbursement_type, pi.paymentamount AS amttobereleased, pi.paymentdate AS disbdate, pi.paymentdate AS lldate, '' AS payableloc, '' AS printingloc, '' AS custcif, '' AS custshrtname, '' AS customer_mobile, '' AS customer_email, '' AS customer_state, '' AS customer_city, '' AS customer_address1, '' AS customer_address2, '' AS customer_address3, '' AS customer_address4, '' AS customer_address5, bd.bankname, bb.branchcode, bb.branchdesc, bbrs.cpprovincename AS benficiary_branch_state, bbrc.pccityname AS benficiary_branch_city, bb.micr AS micr_code, bb.ifsc AS ifsc_code, vpa.accountnumber AS beneficiaryaccno, avd.dealername AS beneficiaryname, avd.dealertelephone AS beneficiary_mobile, avd.email AS benficiry_email, brs.cpprovincename AS benficiary_state, brc.pccityname AS benficiary_city, avd.dealeraddress1 AS benficiary_address1, avd.dealeraddress2 AS benficiary_address2, avd.dealeraddress3 AS benficiary_address3, '' AS benficiary_address4, '' AS benficiary_address5, '' AS payment_detail1, '' AS payment_detail2, '' AS payment_detail3, '' AS payment_detail4, '' AS payment_detail5, '' AS payment_detail6, '' AS payment_detail7, pi.status, pi.remarks, pi.paymenttype, '' AS fintype, pb.partnerbankid, pb.partnerbankcode, pi.paymentdate AS inputdate, pb.alwfiledownload, pb.filename, 1 AS finisactive, pi.entitycode FROM plf.insurancepaymentinstructions pi JOIN plf.rmtcurrencies ccy ON ccy.ccycode = pi.paymentccy JOIN plf.VasRecording VR on VR.paymentinsid=pi.id JOIN plf.partnerbanks pb ON pb.partnerbankid = pi.partnerbankid JOIN plf.vasprovideraccdetail vpa ON vpa.providerid = pi.providerid JOIN plf.amtvehicledealer avd ON avd.dealerid = vpa.providerid LEFT JOIN plf.bankbranches bb ON bb.bankbranchid = vpa.bankbranchid LEFT JOIN plf.bmtbankdetail bd ON bd.bankcode = bb.bankcode LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity bbrc ON bbrc.pccity = bb.city LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince bbrs ON bbrs.cpprovince = bbrc.pcprovince LEFT JOIN plf.rmtprovincevscity brc ON brc.pccity = avd.dealercity LEFT JOIN plf.rmtcountryvsprovince brs ON brs.cpprovince = brc.pcprovince WHERE pi.status = 'APPROVED' AND pi.paymentamount > 0 AND NOT (pi.id IN ( SELECT disbursement_requests.disbursement_id FROM plf.disbursement_requests where channel='I'))

changeSet.author: Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: update plf.data_engine_table set statusupdate = 'UPDATE DISBURSEMENT_REQUESTS SET BATCH_ID = :FILEID, STATUS = ''AC'' WHERE ID IN (:ID) QUERY:UPDATE FINADVANCEPAYMENTS SET STATUS = ''AC'' WHERE PAYMENTID IN (SELECT DISBURSEMENT_ID FROM DISBURSEMENT_REQUESTS WHERE ID IN (:ID) AND STATUS = ''AC'') QUERY:UPDATE PAYMENTINSTRUCTIONS SET STATUS =''AC'' WHERE PAYMENTINSTRUCTIONID IN (SELECT DISBURSEMENT_ID FROM DISBURSEMENT_REQUESTS WHERE ID IN (:ID) AND STATUS =''AC'') QUERY:UPDATE INSURANCEPAYMENTINSTRUCTIONS SET STATUS = ''AC'' WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISBURSEMENT_ID FROM DISBURSEMENT_REQUESTS WHERE ID IN (:ID) AND STATUS =''AC'')' where configid in (select id from data_engine_config where name = 'DISB_EXPORT_DEFAULT');

changeSet.author: murthy.y
Manoj.P
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO BMTAMOUNTCODES VALUES('LATEPAY',0,'ae_penaltyRcv','Penalty Receivable',1,1,1000,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'Approved','','','','','',0);

changeSet.author: Varaprasad.K
changeSet.sql: update plf.smtparameters set sysparmvalue='N' where SysParmCode = 'RECEIPT_CASH_PAN_MANDATORY';

changeSet.author: Manoj.p
